scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r assets/sprites dist/assets/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');(function r(d){fs.readdirSync(d).forEach(f=>{const fp=p.join(d,f);fs.statSync(fp).isDirectory()?r(fp):f.includes(' ')&&fs.renameSync(fp,p.join(d,f.replace(/ /g,'_')))})})('dist/assets/sprites')" && echo '' > dist/.gitignore
